name: TatyanaOracle
profile:
"Fairy tales do not tell children that dragons exist. Children already know that dragons exist. Fairy tales tell children that dragons can be killed." ~ G.K. Chesterton

23 Year old Home Health Aide. Film Student. Part-Time editor. 

FAQ:
I use Sony Vegas Movie Studio 10 to edit my videos.
9 times out of 10, the name and artist of the song will be in the video, either at the beginning, end or both.
Read the descriptions, more then likely the info you are looking for is probably in the des box. 
I almost always pitch shift the songs down, so if they sound different, it is the pitch.
:)
